alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 26 at 3:10PM MST until December 26 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains, Central Carbon County, Southwest Carbon County and Upper North Platte River Basin. Includes the towns of Rawlins...Saratoga...Baggs and Encampment. * WHEN...Through 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. Patchy to areas of blowing snow from recent snowfall could reduce visibility to less than a half mile at times.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin
